body_html: @prb12 There could be some contention between two users of the same GPU, but I can't see how that would affect the WhereOp, which runs on CPU, with input data that comes from the CPU. (I suppose it might take a trip via the GPU to do some of the reductions, depending on what host-memory kernels are registered, but I can't see how that would cause racy behavior unless something in the GPU->CPU transfer is very broken....)
